name: SmashingSecurity
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Join computer security industry veterans Graham Cluley, Vanja Svajcer and Carole Theriault as they chat each week about the latest news from the world of cybercrime, hacking and online privacy.

Follow the podcast on Twitter at @SmashinSecurity and tell us what you think!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
